descripcion:
In the heart of Arenys de Mar, on the town's most emblematic and prestigious street, we present this exclusive and incomparable residence, close to the beach, train station, and all services.
With an area of 450 m², the home has been completely renovated and equipped with high-end finishes, becoming a true gem that combines the elegance of its original architecture with the comfort of a modern house.

It features a spacious living-dining room, a separate designer kitchen fully equipped with access to a spectacular patio, and a total of 5 bedrooms (several en suite), all designed for maximum comfort. The house has high-end parquet floors, luxury furniture, air conditioning in all rooms, 4 bathrooms, an office with a fireplace, a versatile entrance hall, wine cellar, garden, and garage included in the price. In addition, it is equipped with an elevator for greater convenience. All the house's installations (electricity, gas, air conditioning) have been newly installed with the most modern technologies.

Outside, the spacious patio offers the possibility of building a private pool, creating a luxury oasis in the very center of town.

A unique and unrepeatable property in Maresme, perfect for those seeking exclusivity, design, and comfort in a privileged seaside location.

Purchase costs not included in the sale price.
